key_responsibilities: overseeing the intern program and supervising interns
assisting with the constituent correspondence operation
providing support to the Congresswoman and staff as needed
requirements: strong interpersonal, organizational and communications skills
ability to handle multiple competing deadlines under pressure
Internship or other Hill experience is preferred

key_responsibilities: develop and execute the Congresswoman’s long-term communication plan
oversee all video production and photography
lead or contribute to regular newsletters, mail pieces and reports
designing graphics and web content and maintaining the office’s website
assist the Communications Director with drafting press releases, advisories, talking points, op-eds and other materials
requirements: Previous experience in press or relevant social media experience is required
proficient in photography, video recording and editing
ability to work in a fast-paced, demanding work setting
sense of humor and ability to be a team player
Spanish language skills are a plus

key_responsibilities: manage all aspects of constituent correspondence
requirements: Preliminary knowledge of IQ is preferred

key_responsibilities: monitor legislative developments within Committees and on the House floor
write Floor speeches for the Member
meet with constituents and special interest groups on behalf of the Member
requirements: 3-5 years of experience, with 2-3 years of Hill experience
strong writing, research and organizational skills
